body:
<!--
**PLEASE READ THIS FIRST:**
- Do not use the bug and feature tracker for support requests. Use the `cython-users` mailing list instead.
- Did you search for similar issues already? Please do, it helps to save us precious time that we otherwise could not invest into development.
- Did you try the latest master branch or pre-release? It might already have what you want to report. Also see the [Changelog](https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/master/CHANGES.rst) regarding recent changes.
-->

**Describe the bug**
When compiling some Cython code where signature of function `.pyx` doesn't match `.pxd` (see below for example), I get:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/bin/cythonize", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Build/Cythonize.py", line 223, in main
    cython_compile(path, options)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Build/Cythonize.py", line 106, in cython_compile
    **options.options)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1102, in cythonize
    cythonize_one(*args)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1208, in cythonize_one
    result = compile_single(pyx_file, options, full_module_name=full_module_name)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 727, in compile_single
    return run_pipeline(source, options, full_module_name)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 515, in run_pipeline
    err, enddata = Pipeline.run_pipeline(pipeline, source)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 355, in run_pipeline
    data = run(phase, data)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 335, in run
    return phase(data)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 52, in generate_pyx_code_stage
    module_node.process_implementation(options, result)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 143, in process_implementation
    self.generate_c_code(env, options, result)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 385, in generate_c_code
    self.body.generate_function_definitions(env, code)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 442, in generate_function_definitions
    stat.generate_function_definitions(env, code)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 1945, in generate_function_definitions
    self.generate_argument_parsing_code(env, code)
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 2629, in generate_argument_parsing_code
    self.type.opt_arg_cname(declarator.name)))
  File "/home/itamarst/Devel/arrow/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 2958, in opt_arg_cname
    return self.op_arg_struct.base_type.scope.lookup(arg_name).cname
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'cname'
```

**To Reproduce**

Create `test.pxd`:

```cython
cdef int func(a=*) except *
```

Create `test.pyx`:

```cython
# cython: profile=False
# distutils: language = c++
# cython: embedsignature = True

cdef int func(a=None, b=None) except *:
    if b is not None:
        pass
    return 0
```

Run:

```shell-session
$ cythonize -3 test.pyx
```
**Expected behavior**

Should give a meaningful error, e.g. "Function 'func' signature in test.pyx does not match 'func` signature in test.pxd". Instead, we get a traceback.

**Environment (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux
 - Python version: 3.7.10
 - Cython version: 0.29.22
title: [BUG] Internal compiler traceback (instead of meaningful compiler error message) when function definition in .pyx doesn't match prototype in .pxd
